item.description:
Â 

A Good Fun Night of Dancing this Friday at the Bar Room Boston. It's a desi party and if we form a group it should be a great time. It's also ladies free before 11PM with RSVP. Information reads

This Friday we bring you Desi Party with a Killer Sound System at the Bar Room Boston.

We have Dj Laloo & Dj Bailoo Djing all night long at the CLUB LEVEL.


With the weather getting better and people looking to go out more this is the perfect opportunity to party with Fellow Desi's while the Dj's play the best in Bollywood/ Bhangra/ Desi Remixes.

Right at the heart of Downtown Boston. The Dj's will be Taking over on the main/ Club Floor of Bar Room Boston.

Where: Bar Room Boston (5 Broad Street) Located in Fanuiel Hall Boston (2nd Floor)

Time: 10:00 PM (Ladies free before 11pm with RSVP)

We have been sold out every Friday by Midnight. Come early.

2012: This year we bring you more exciting Dj's at Downtown Bostons all Desi Party on Friday will several new additions to our Line up.

But first this Friday. Bar Room Boston - 5 Broad Street, Boston MA (Upstairs)

See what the Buzzzzzz is about !!

This week back by Popular Demand Dj Laloo & Dj Bailu Rocking the House.

$10 Cover on the Guestlist. Ladies free before 11:00 PM with RSVP by emailing: Generationdesi@gmail.com

Share your reviews about Desi Party @ The Bar Room Boston this Friday

item.name: Desi Party @ The Bar Room Boston this Friday
